RANPARIA BROTHERS begins its journey as: RANPARIA BROTHERS begins its journey as an agricultural diesel engine fuel pipes manufacturer within a 200 sq. feet workshop.
Received the first ever project of manuf: Received the first ever project of manufacturing 10 nos. of diesel engine fuel pipes and other parts.
Started manufacturing end fitings of pip: Started manufacturing end fitings of pipes from mild steel and brass material and became the first ever inhouse manufacturer of pipe assemblies by installing necessary machinery and started supplying to local oem based company.
Relocated the business in new building w: Relocated the business in new building with a floor area space around 3600 sq. feet and also expanded our in-house facilities by installing new machineries.
Installed cold forging line with well eq: Installed cold forging line with well equipped machinery.
Incorporated “rajesh brass parts industr: Incorporated “rajesh brass parts industries” to a newly developed premises with floor space area of around 15000 sq. feet and installed various machineries like trobe, threading, mechanical press, tube draw bench machine etc.

Incorporated “ranparia engineering pvt. ltd.” and started supplying auto components to the auto sector, and got certified by iso 9001:2000 tuv sud, eventually became tier 1 and tier 2 supplier.
Started cast iron unit in joint venture: Started cast iron unit in joint venture for manufacturing graded casting products and installed numerous cnc machines and spm drills.
Incorporated “RANPARIA ENGINEERING CO.”: Incorporated “RANPARIA ENGINEERING CO.” and merged with “RAJESH BRASS PARTS” and “RANPARIA ENGINEERING PVT LTD”.
